Platform Support.name: Platform Support
Platform Support.description: Which operating systems are supported (iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, Linux)?

User Interface (UI/UX).name: User Interface (UI/UX)
User Interface (UI/UX).description: Is it beginner-friendly, or geared toward advanced users (e.g., CLI vs. GUI)?

Open Source Status.name: Open Source Status
Open Source Status.description: Is the code open source? If so, link to the repository (e.g., GitHub).

Custodial vs. Non-Custodial.name: Custodial vs. Non-Custodial
Custodial vs. Non-Custodial.description: Does the wallet give users full control of private keys, or is it custodial?

KYC.name: KYC
KYC.description: Does the wallet require Know Your Customer verification for use?

Transaction Fees.name: Transaction Fees
Transaction Fees.description: How are fees handled (fixed, configurable, dynamic based on network)?

Transaction Limits.name: Transaction Limits
Transaction Limits.description: Are there limits on transaction sizes or frequencies?

Backup Options.name: Backup Options
Backup Options.description: How are keys and channels backed up (e.g., seed phrase, static channel backup, cloud)?

Lightning Network Implementation.name: Lightning Network Implementation
Lightning Network Implementation.description: Which Lightning Network implementation is used (e.g., LND, c-lightning, Eclair)?

Node Type.name: Node Type
Node Type.description: Does the wallet run a full Lightning node, a light client, or rely on a remote node?

BOLT11 Support.name: BOLT11 Support
BOLT11 Support.description: Does it support BOLT11 invoices for payments?

BOLT12 Support.name: BOLT12 Support
BOLT12 Support.description: Does it support BOLT12 offers (e.g., reusable invoices)?

UMA Support.name: UMA Support
UMA Support.description: Does it support Universal Money Addresses (UMA) for cross-platform payments?

BOLT12 + HRN (BLIP32) Support.name: BOLT12 + HRN (BLIP32) Support
BOLT12 + HRN (BLIP32) Support.description: Does it support BOLT12 with Hashed Random Nonces (HRN) per BLIP32?

LNURL Support.name: LNURL Support
LNURL Support.description: Does it support LNURL-auth, LNURL-pay, LNURL-withdraw, etc.?

Lightning Address Support.name: Lightning Address Support
Lightning Address Support.description: Does it support human-readable Lightning Addresses (e.g., user@domain.com)?

No-Amount Invoices.name: No-Amount Invoices
No-Amount Invoices.description: Can it generate invoices without a specified amount (open-ended)?

Invoice Expiry Control.name: Invoice Expiry Control
Invoice Expiry Control.description: Can users customize invoice expiration times?

Custom Invoice Metadata.name: Custom Invoice Metadata
Custom Invoice Metadata.description: Can users add custom metadata to invoices (e.g., for merchant tracking or descriptions)?

Offline Receiving (Non-Custodial).name: Offline Receiving (Non-Custodial)
Offline Receiving (Non-Custodial).description: Can the wallet receive payments while offline (e.g., via LNURL, async payments, non-custodially)?

On-Chain Integration.name: On-Chain Integration
On-Chain Integration.description: Can the wallet handle on-chain Bitcoin transactions alongside Lightning?

Separate LN / On-Chain Balances.name: Separate LN / On-Chain Balances
Separate LN / On-Chain Balances.description: Are Lightning and on-chain balances tracked distinctly in the UI?

Bitcoin Address Type.name: Bitcoin Address Type
Bitcoin Address Type.description: Which Bitcoin address types can it generate (e.g., SegWit bech32, Taproot bech32m, Legacy)?

Taproot Transactions.name: Taproot Transactions
Taproot Transactions.description: Can it send to and receive from Taproot addresses (e.g., Schnorr signatures supported)?

Submarine Swaps.name: Submarine Swaps
Submarine Swaps.description: Are submarine swaps supported for seamless on-chain â†” Lightning conversion?

Swap-in Potentiam (SIP).name: Swap-in Potentiam (SIP)
Swap-in Potentiam (SIP).description: Does it allow potential swaps for future liquidity (e.g., pre-arranged conversions)?

Tor.name: Tor
Tor.description: Does it support Tor or onion routing for privacy?

Payment Decorrelation.name: Payment Decorrelation
Payment Decorrelation.description: Does it implement techniques to prevent payment correlation (e.g., random delays, dummy hops)?

Channel Management.name: Channel Management
Channel Management.description: Can users open/close channels manually, or is it automated?

Inbound Liquidity.name: Inbound Liquidity
Inbound Liquidity.description: Can users manage inbound capacity (e.g., swaps, channel opening)?

Rebalancing Tools.name: Rebalancing Tools
Rebalancing Tools.description: Are there tools to rebalance channel liquidity?

Maximum Channel Capacity.name: Maximum Channel Capacity
Maximum Channel Capacity.description: What's the largest payment/channel size supported?

Number of Confirmations to Channel Usabi.name: Number of Confirmations to Channel Usability
Number of Confirmations to Channel Usabi.description: How many on-chain confirmations are needed before a channel is usable?

Dual-Funded Channels.name: Dual-Funded Channels
Dual-Funded Channels.description: Can channels be dual-funded (both parties contribute funds) for better liquidity?

Splicing Support.name: Splicing Support
Splicing Support.description: Does it allow splicing (adding/removing funds from channels without closing them)?

Zero-Conf Channels.name: Zero-Conf Channels
Zero-Conf Channels.description: Does it support zero-confirmation channels for instant usability?

Private vs. Public Channels.name: Private vs. Public Channels
Private vs. Public Channels.description: Can users choose between private (unannounced) and public (routable) channels?

Lightning Service Provider (LSP) Integra.name: Lightning Service Provider (LSP) Integration
Lightning Service Provider (LSP) Integra.description: Does it rely on or integrate with LSPs for simplified node management?

Hub Connectivity.name: Hub Connectivity
Hub Connectivity.description: Does it connect to specific hubs, or is it fully decentralized?

Watchtower Integration.name: Watchtower Integration
Watchtower Integration.description: Is there built-in support for watchtowers to prevent channel fraud?

Peer Backup Options.name: Peer Backup Options
Peer Backup Options.description: Can channel states be backed up with trusted peers instead of centralized services?

Force-Close Handling.name: Force-Close Handling
Force-Close Handling.description: How does it manage force-closed channels (e.g., penalty transactions, recovery options)?

State Channel Recovery.name: State Channel Recovery
State Channel Recovery.description: Are there mechanisms to recover lost channel states (e.g., from corrupted data)?

MPP.name: MPP
MPP.description: Does it support Multi-Path Payments (e.g., AMP)?

JIT Routing.name: JIT Routing
JIT Routing.description: Does it support Just-In-Time routing to dynamically adjust liquidity during payments?

Trampoline Payments.name: Trampoline Payments
Trampoline Payments.description: Can it use trampoline nodes to simplify routing for lightweight clients?

Dynamic Fee Bumping.name: Dynamic Fee Bumping
Dynamic Fee Bumping.description: Does it support RBF (Replace-By-Fee) or CPFP (Child-Pays-For-Parent) for stuck transactions?

Channel Liquidity Ads.name: Channel Liquidity Ads
Channel Liquidity Ads.description: Does it support advertising available liquidity to other nodes (e.g., via BOLT 14)?

Stuckless Payments.name: Stuckless Payments
Stuckless Payments.description: Does it support stuckless payment proposals to avoid HTLC timeouts?

HODL Invoices.name: HODL Invoices
HODL Invoices.description: Does it allow "HODL invoices" where payment is held until a condition is met?

Stateless Invoices.name: Stateless Invoices
Stateless Invoices.description: Does it support stateless invoices that don't require server-side storage?

Simple Taproot Channels.name: Simple Taproot Channels
Simple Taproot Channels.description: Does it support Taproot-optimized Lightning channels?

Taproot Assets.name: Taproot Assets
Taproot Assets.description: Can it handle Taproot-based assets beyond BTC on Lightning?

CLTV Expiry Delta Custom.name: CLTV Expiry Delta Custom
CLTV Expiry Delta Custom.description: Can users set custom CheckLockTimeVerify (CLTV) deltas per channel?

Advanced Channel Outputs.name: Advanced Channel Outputs
Advanced Channel Outputs.description: Does it support V3 commitments, ephemeral anchors, or anchor outputs?

Testnet Support.name: Testnet Support
Testnet Support.description: Can it connect to Bitcoin/Lightning testnet for development or experimentation?

Developer APIs/SDKs.name: Developer APIs/SDKs
Developer APIs/SDKs.description: Are there APIs or SDKs available for integration into other apps?
